charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was in the forest
when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came across Elio and something huge
with a powerful presence standing next to him.
charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_0402_0700_10: Oh yeah, I guess I hadn’t introduced you two yet.
charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_1201_1000_10:
Most people who see it for the first time are
startled and think it’s a moving wall, but it’s my
trusty partner Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_1201_1100_10:
Stakataka is an Ultra Beast—a Pokémon that came
here from another world.
charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_1201_1200_10:
It has a unique appearance, but there are tons
of mysteries about it as an organism beyond
its looks.
charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_1201_1300_10:
At first, I was worried about forming a sync pair
with Stakataka.
charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_1201_1400_10:
I didn’t wanna cause it any trouble, and I was
concerned about my lack of knowledge holding it
back from showing its true strengths.
charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_1201_1500_10:
Looking at Guzma, Jasmine, and Liza on
Pasio, though...
charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_1201_1600_10:
They all befriended their Ultra Beasts in their
own unique ways.
charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_1201_1700_10:
I realized something after I saw them go
through that.
charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_1201_1800_10:
When you wanna befriend someone for the first
time, it doesn’t matter if they’re a person, Ultra
Beast, or Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_1201_1900_10:
You won’t get anywhere if you don’t take the first
step! Same thing as when I started my journey
in Alola.
charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_1201_2000_10:
Don’t worry about the things you’re unsure
of—just learn as you go!
charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_1201_2100_10:
What’s important is you challenge yourself to
everything at full power!
charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_1201_2200_10:
I thought I’d gained enough courage to face the
unknown after I did the island challenge...
charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_1201_2300_10:
but being here on Pasio has taught me that it
might be too soon for me to say I’m fully confident
in myself.
charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_1201_2400_10:
So, with all that said, after Stakataka and I
became friends, I learned a few things that are
definitely true...
charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_1201_2500_10: It’s super strong, and I can always count on it!
charaepi_ch0122_80_yo/2301_0402_2900_10:
Heheh. Then should we confirm with a
Pokémon battle?
